page.title: 14RELIGION
page.content: {THE CHURCH OF ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST AT {HONILEY}IS REPUTED TO HAVE BEEN DESIGNED BY{SIR CHRISTOPHER WREN}BUT THERE IS NO PROOF. IT WAS{BUILT IN {1723}OF PALE YELLOW SANDSTONE.SINCE NOVEMBER 1984 THERE HAS NOT BEEN A RESIDENT VICAR.{THE VICARAGE WAS SOLD {AT AN AUCTION HELD AT THE BOOT INN, {HONILEY IN JUNE 1985.}THERE ARE STILL TWO SERVICES HELD AT THE CHURCH EACH SUNDAY, FAMILY SERVICE AT 10.15AM AND EITHER HOLY COMMUNION OR EVENSONG. WITHIN THE CHURCH COMMUNITY THERE IS A MOTHERS AND TODDLERS GROUP, 2.OOPM UNTIL 3.30PM EVERY WEDNESDAY; A WOMAN'S CLUB ONCE A FORTNIGHT;A YOUTH CLUB (11 TO 18YRS)7.30PM UNTIL 9.30PM EVERY FRIDAY. OTHER SOCIAL EVENTS ORGANISED BY THE VILLAGERS ARE A HARVEST SOCIAL, A CHRISTMAS PARTY AND A SUMMER FAIR. THEY HELD A SPECIAL PARTY FOR QUEEN ELIZABETH'S JUBILEE.
